text: Ludwig is a 1973 Italian French German biographical drama movie directed by Luchino Visconti and starring Helmut Berger, Romy Schneider, Trevor Howard, Silvana Mangano, Gert Fröbe, Helmut Griem, John Moulder-Brown, Heinz Moog. The movie is about Ludwig II, the King of Bavaria. ==Other websites== * Category:1973 drama movies Category:1970s biographical movies Category:1970s historical movies Category:1970s epic movies Category:1973 LGBT movies Category:Italian LGBT movies Category:Italian biographical movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:German LGBT movies Category:German biographical movies Category:German drama movies Category:French LGBT movies Category:French biographical movies Category:French drama movies Category:Monégasque movies Category:Movies directed by Luchino Visconti Category:MGM movies Category:Movies set in the 1860s Category:Movies set in the 1870s Category:Movies set in the 1880s Category:Movies set in Bavaria
title: Ludwig (movie)
